title: Bloomberg Markets: Broadcom Offers $105 Billion for Qualcomm
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Broadcom Offers $105 Billion for Qualcomm
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010John Mathis\u0010Partner\u0010Harbor View Advisors \u0010Discussing Broadcom's "epic" offer of about $105 billion for Qualcomm, kicking off an ambitious attempt at the largest technology takeover ever in a deal that would rock the electronics industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
